dcterms:description: This dataset presents the adaptation of Escherichia coli ATCC 8739 to high salinity conditions, specifically 11% NaCl, and includes data on the genetic changes observed during this adaptation process.
dcterms:title: Adaptation of Escherichia coli ATCC 8739 to 11% NaCl

dcterms:creator: H. A. How

dcterms:description: This dataset explores the changes in genetic sequences of Escherichia coli with respect to different mutation rates, providing insights into the relationship between mutation rates and genetic variation.
dcterms:title: Changes in genetic sequences with respect to mutation rates
